Itâ€™s easy to become a member and begin to take advantage of our products, services, and other member benefits. List of Required Documents Join or Apply Spanish ATMs & Branches Rates Routing#: 314088530 Personal Accounts Checking Savings Certificates / IRAs Youth Other River City Investment Services Trustage Insurance Loans Vehicle Home Student Credit Cards Personal Loans Additional Services Digital Banking Check Reorder Funds Transfer Calculators Find your next car Make a Payment Skip a Payment RIA - International Transfers Business Business Accounts Business Checking Business Savings Business Loans Vehicle Signature Credit Cards Line of Credit Commercial Real Estate Loan Additional Services RCity Business Solutions Digital Banking Check Reorder Funds Transfer Calculators FinancialÂ Wellness Resources Learning Lab FS Financial Empowerment Financial Basics Credit Builder Greenpath Frauds & Scams Ourcityfcu Events Community Events We Give Back Scholarships Juntos Avanzamos Member Value Antonio The Otter Love My CU Rewards RCITY CREDIT CARD REWARDS Refer A Friend Newsletters AboutÂ Us Who We Are Membership Mission / Values Leadership / Board Members Annual Reports ATM & Branch Locations Media Contact For Media Inquiries, email marketing@rivercityfcu.org Blog Login Contact Us Reach us by Phone, Email or Fax Member Contact Center (210) 225-0708 | (800) 644-4748 Monday - Friday: 8:30am to 5:30pm Saturday: 9:00am to 12:00pm Sunday: closed Avoid the wait use online or mobile banking . This service is available 24/7. Email: membercontactcenter@rivercityfcu.org Disclaimer: For your security, please do not email any sensitive personal information such as your account number, Social Security number, passwords, or other confidential data. Email is not a secure method of communication, and we cannot guarantee the safety of your information if sent this way. If you need to share sensitive information, please contact us through our secure online banking platform or visit or call us directly. Fax (210) 890-3884 (available during operational hours only) Mailing Address River City Federal Credit Union PO Box 681029 San Antonio, TX 78268 Loan Application (210) 244-2505 Monday â€“ Friday: 8:30 a.m. â€“ 5:30 p.m. Saturday: 9:00 a.m. â€“ 1:00 p.m. Bill Pay Member Support +1 (855) 327-5158 Monday â€“ Friday: 8:30am â€“ 1am Saturday â€“ Sunday: closed Insurance Department River City FCU requires you to provide evidence of current insurance. If you have received a notice from RCFCU requesting proof of insurance, please use our secure site to submit electronically at www.MyLoanInsurance.com . You may also send a copy to: River City FCU Attn: Insurance Dept. PO Box 681029 San Antonio, TX 78268 Phone: (210) 244-2500 Fax: (210) 348-8964 Mortgage Insurance Please send proof of home mortgage insurance with the following Mortgagee Clause to: River City Federal Credit Union Its Successors and/or Assigns (ISAOA) PO Box 681029 San Antonio, TX 78268 (210) 244-2500 Collections Team (210) 348-8964 fax Other Key Numbers: Report your Debit or Credit Card Lost or Stolen (210) 225-0708 | (800) 644-4748 Cards can also be deactivated within rcityonline and rcitymobile banking. Contact Form Name * First Name Last Name Email * Phone (###) ### #### Subject * Message Thank you! TOP Mailing Address River City Federal Credit Union PO Box 681029, San Antonio, TX 78268 Contact Locations & Hours Lost or Stolen Card Contact Us Additional Information Disclosures and Member Forms Accessibility Statement Careers Site Map *APR = Annual Percentage Rate. Rate based on creditworthiness and term of loan. **APY = Annual Percentage Yield. Rates are subject to change at any time and are not guaranteed. We provide links to third party partners, independent from River City FCU. These links are provided only as a convenience. We do not manage the content of those sites. The privacy and security policies of external websites will differ from those of River City FCU. Powered By: OMNICOMM NDER

Important Numbers Important Numbers Lost or Stolen Cards Your financial security is important to us. To report your card lost or stolen, please use the resources provided below. Lost or stolen debit card 800-500-1044 Falcon (Debit Card Security) 855-961-1602 Credit cards issued by ServisFirst Bank 877-228-2024 Identity Theft If you become a victim of identity theft, we recommend you immediately do these 3 things: 1. Contact your bank(s) and credit card issuers. Call River City Bank at (706) 236-2123. 2. Report it to the Federal Trade Commission at www.identity theft.gov or call 1-877-IDTHEFT (1-877-438-4338). 3. About | River City Grille | Marble Falls, TX Menus Order Online Private Events Calendar Gift Cards About Us Gallery Loyalty Program (Open Facebook page in new tab) (Open Twitter page in new tab) (Open Instagram page in new tab) (Open Google page in new tab) Weather Forecast About Us Great food, friendly people, casual atmosphere and lakefront location are what make River City Grille a
                                            favorite spot for the folks in Marble Falls and Highland Lakes! At River City Grille, we believe that the best family traditions start in the kitchen. We provide an
                                            extensive menu featuring all your favorites including chicken fried steak, a signature prime rib, as well as
                                            our own unique selections created from family recipes. With two bars, we offer a grand selection of wines,
                                            draft and local beers. Our team of friendly, professional employees prepares all of our menu items fresh every
                                            day, and our steaks are hand cut from Certified Angus Beef. Dine inside surrounded by rustic, Texas dÃ©cor or have a relaxing meal on the deck overlooking beautiful
                                            Marble Falls. Children are always welcome and will enjoy our large kidâ€™s menu items and adults will love our
                                            happy hour every Monday through Friday. River City Grille provides delicious food that is made with the freshest ingredients. Join us for breakfast,
                                            lunch, or dinner or call in for take-out or catering! DOING Our Part TO GIVE BACK Founders Paul and Connie Brady have been in the restaurant business all their lives. Paul started out washing dishes over 30 years ago. He played several key roles at Victoria Station where he
                                            learned the art of cutting steaks and cooking prime rib. He then opened several Chili's restaurants and went on to help develop the Olive Garden restaurants all over
                                            the Western United States. Paul ran the Chuy's family of restaurants before he and Connie started River City
                                            Grille. Paul and Connie take great pride in the business they have developed and look forward to serving customers
                                            for
                                            many years to come. Whether you are a first time visitor or a regular customer, we strive to make every visit
                                            to River City Grille a great experience. Not only are we passionate about taking care of our dining guests, we are committed to being a good neighbor
                                            and supporting our local community organizations. MEET Our Team Will DeShazo General Manager Michelle Murray Manager OUR Awards DONATION Requests River City Grille responds to as many donation requests as possible. However, due to the
                                        frequency and volume of requests, we are, unfortunately, not able to fulfill all requests. The earlier you submit
                                        your request, the more likely we are to be able to donate to your cause - we request at least 60 days notice. To
                                        help this process along, we ask that you put your request in writing. If your organization is interested in receiving a donation from River City Grille, please download this pdf and
                                        submit the completed donation request form to River City Grille via email - rcg@nctv.com - or in person at the
                                        restaurant. Our goal is to respond to your request as quickly as possible. You will be contacted within 30 days of submitting
                                        a request. Paul proudly serves on the Board of Directors for The Phoenix Center. For more information click the link below. Founder and Executive Director Sarah Garrett and Therapy dog Mabel Mailing List Leave A Review Contact Careers Contact 700 1st St Marble Falls, TX 78654 (830) 798-9909 Hours Monday-Thursday: 11am-8pm Friday-Saturday: 11am-9pm Sunday: 11am-8pm Follow (Open Facebook page in new tab) (Open Twitter page in new tab) (Open Instagram page in new tab) (Open Google page in new tab) Accessibility Policy | Privacy Policy | Terms of Use Copyright Â© 2025.
